sentence.Network_cn: 他的左眼皮不由自主地跳动。
她的目光不由自主地移开了.

英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(I3) ... involucrum 总苞 involuntarily 无心地 involuntary 非自愿的.

list.abs: shoot fatally 致命地射杀shoot involuntarily 无意地射中shoot maniacally 疯狂地射击
he was involuntarily held against his will .他很不情愿地违背了自己的意愿。
Winston paused involuntarily ., 温斯顿不由自主停下了脚步.
rock , sway , or nod ; usually involuntarily ., 摇动 , 摇摆或点头 ; 常常不自觉.

entry.def: If you make an involuntary movement or exclamation, you make it suddenly and without intending to because you are unable to control yourself.

example.ex: Another surge of pain in my ankle caused me to give an involuntary shudder.
example.tran: 脚踝突然又一阵疼痛，痛得我直打哆嗦。

entry.def: You use involuntary to describe an action or situation which is forced on someone.

example.tran: 涵盖非自愿失业的保险单

example.ex: Involuntary repatriation of Haitians began this week.
example.tran: 这周已开始将海地人强制遣送回国。

sentences.sentence: "he was involuntarily held against his will"

auth_sentence.content: It happened again; I shivered involuntarily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It happened again; I shivered involuntarily.

auth_sentence.content: When asked whether he was involuntarily confined, his answer was vehement.
auth_sentence.res_content: When asked whether he was involuntarily confined, his answer was vehement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When asked whether he was involuntarily confined, his answer was vehement.

auth_sentence.content: Tics are defined as socially inappropriate movements or sounds that are made involuntarily.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tics are defined as socially inappropriate movements or sounds that are made involuntarily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tics are defined as socially inappropriate movements or sounds that are made involuntarily.

sentences.cn: 她的目光不由自主地移开了。

sentences.en: She shivered involuntarily as he approached her.
sentences.cn: 他离她越来越近，她不由自主地颤抖起来。
